p: The effects of extracts on cell growth (viability) were assessed in human macrophages (U937 cells), which are the host cells for L. ( V) panamensis parasites. Alternatively, the antiparasitic activity of these extracts was tested on intracellular amastigotes of L. ( V) panamensis according to their ability to reduce the number of parasites after exposure. The results are summarized in Table-3.
